columns.Mission_ID: The unique identifier for each mission.
columns.Ship_ID: The identifier of the associated ship.
columns.Code: The mission code used for reference.
columns.Launched_Year: The year in which the mission was launched.
columns.Location: The geographical location of the mission.
columns.Speed_knots: The speed of the ship during the mission in knots.
columns.Fate: The final status or outcome of the mission.

mission.table_description: The mission table records details about various ship missions.

columns.Ship_ID: The unique identifier for each ship.
columns.Name: The name of the ship.
columns.Type: The classification type of the ship.
columns.Nationality: The country of registration for the ship.
columns.Tonnage: The weight capacity of the ship in tons.

ship.table_description: The ship table stores details about various ships.
